topic.title: Sidebar does not load
topic.body:
Whenever I try to pull out the sidebar an error message appears.
The message is as follows:

`Internal error: TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for /: 'float' and 'str'
UiWebsocket.py line 98 > UiWebsocket.py line 175 > SidebarPlugin.py line 432 > SidebarPlugin.py line 211`

This happens on several zerosites, both on an alpine linux (edge distribution) and a debian linux (testing distribution) based docker container, and happens both on amd64 and armv7 devices.

1604065411_mirrored_casept_github.body: ZeroHello (the site which opens automatically) for example.
Seems to be fixed now, closing.

1604065456_mirrored_vishnuhariam_github.body: Note that some mobile providers utilize carrier grade NAT and therefore you can't forward the port (at least not without hacking their networking equipment).

1604065473_mirrored_aitorpazos_github.body: tor probably shouldn't be run in the same container as zeronet. Also, not running ZN as root within the container should be considered.

1604065493_mirrored_yangleitj_github.body: Seems like an instance of ZN is already running on that port. Try a different port.

1604065592_mirrored_SergeyDjam_github.body: cd into the install directory, then do this: `python2 /path/to/directory/containing/zeronet/zeronet.py --data_dir ~/data --log_dir ~/logs`. For some reason the code is picky regarding the directory you are in when you run it.
